name: Midnight Cafe
description:
❝ So, wanna some cuppa? ❞

It's Halloween, a day full of myths about the supernatural and everyone decides to come together to tell scary stories that show that humans can be scarier than any supernatural activity, that is, themselves. The Séance is a café whose owner is nothing more than the personification of death, an angel of death called Asriel and works as a neutral place that serves humans and supernatural creatures with the most diverse drinks. Known for its odd hours, the cafe only opens at late night, and Halloween is no different. While humans are out there hunting trick-or-treating shenanigans, you stumble on this place where creatures decide to take a coffee break and gossip about what humans are capable of. Are you able to remember the details correctly and tell a story about how humans can be scary?

❝ It can help with your memories…❞

Midnight Café is a visual novel about late nights, supernatural and true crime. It's a coffee break where you can gossip about how humans are scary, spooky, and well suited for the Spooktober 4th Annual Visual Novel Jam.

  • Format: Visual Novel 
  • Genre: Horror, Supernatural, True Crime
  • Length: ~ 11000
  • Language: English
  • Platform: PC (Windows, Mac, Linux)
  • Warnings/Trigger Warnings: This work is a work of fiction. There are mentions of domestic violence, drowning, blood, gore, death, drugs. Player discretion is advised.
  • Artist, story writer, Logo Designer, UI designer: @Nyxastrae
  • Programming, Ren'py scripter, audio editor: @giancarlozero

 ✦   Disclaimer:

Midnight Café is a short project for Spooktober 4th Annual Visual Novel Jam made in one month. It's the first novel from a series of stories settled in a universe full of magic and mythological creatures. If you enjoy our game, please give us a follow to for more information about updates and future games from us.
